   Kevin Nicholson
   stated on April 19, 2018 in news release:
   Says conservative mega-donor Richard Uihlein is a Wisconsin resident.

The article notes that Uihlein is a resident of Illinois, but has a
   substantial presence in Wisconsin politics:

   Richard Uihlein, a wealthy shipping-supplies magnate from Illinois who
   shuns the spotlight, has risen to become one of the most powerful — and
   disruptive — GOP donors in the country.

In an April 13, 2018, article, the Associated Press also noted the
   involvement of Uihlein in Wisconsin politics:

   The billionaire founder of shipping and packaging supply giant Uline Corp.
   continues to spend big on Wisconsin’s U.S. Senate race in support of
   Delafield businessman Kevin Nicholson.

Share the Facts
   PolitiFact Rating:
   False
   Says conservative mega-donor Richard Uihlein is a Wisconsin resident.
